group_1.textLeft: They said our seats are near the middle of the bus.

group_1.textRight: I heard we're going to be featured on the show,@so I'm feeling kind of nervous...

group_1.textLeft: Unless it's an occasion like this, I can't ever begin@to atone for what I did to Kurusu.

group_1.textRight: Today's ceremony is important.@We have to make our song the best it can be!
The Yunohana International choir members have@already boarded the bus.

group_1.textLeft: Well then, once all the Advocates are here,@please take your seats as quickly as possible!

group_1.textRight: *Sigh*...
This should finally bring an end to the troublesome@Magical Girl issue...

group_1.textLeft: I'm really sorry for causing you so much trouble,@Kurara...

group_1.textRight: Speaking of which, won't the Eradicators be joining@us on the bus?

group_1.textLeft: It seems they went ahead to talk to Rabi-san.

group_1.textRight: Today is an important day for both the Magical Girls@and townspeople alike,
as it signifies the end of their old, tragic relationship.
So, I would appreciate it if you could be mindful@during the broadcast.

group_1.textLeft: Of course, I'll make sure of it!
I won't neglect the people who've helped me.

group_1.textRight: Does that mean Witches are less likely to appear in@areas with smaller populations?
Good thinkin', Miura.

group_1.textLeft: We reached this conclusion with the support of@Shirogane-dono and the others.
The Nightlife Homeroom staff also gave us a hand.
I'm sorry for inconveniencing everyone by having@them come all this way...

group_1.textRight: I said that we're joinin' hands, but this is also a@chance for us to apologize.
Thanks for arranging it.

group_1.textLeft: This all started because I couldn't protect Haitani@and the others.
Even so, once you calm down, you'll understand.
It's tough to keep gettin' a 100% perfect score,@no matter how hard you try.
We kept pressing for it...
Honestly, just being supported by you guys was@more than enough.

group_1.textRight: Yeah... After seeing the decrease in the number of@accidents and incidents in Yukuni City,
we came to realize that we had been saved,@and understood our mistakes...

group_1.textLeft: I even saw with my own eyes how they died to@prevent themselves from becoming Witches...

group_1.textRight: But, is that why we were called here? To vent the@frustrations we've been holding onto all this time?
...I'm going to turn myself in to the police after this,@like I promised.

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not the reason...
Asahi has suffered from the actions of Witches and@the Eradication Faction.
So we gathered everyone here in hopes of finding@solace and to heal each other's hearts.
We sincerely hope to bring healing to everyone here.

group_1.textRight: Even though I'm the one at fault, I'm being cared@for like this...

group_1.textLeft: I remembered something Rabi told me once.
We must first heal everyone in the Eradication@Faction.
Our approach was misguided at first, mistakenly@choosing to embrace the violence.
This time, I hope we can properly heal with our@own two hands.

group_1.textRight: I'm speechless... But as long as Miura and the@others are doing well...

group_1.textLeft: [se:7201_detect_magic][chara:103401:effect_ef_adv_01]This is, a Witchâ€•

group_1.textRight: What's with this timing...?!

group_1.textLeft: And, this magic reaction...
No way, it can still move even after all the@unique magic I've cast on it...

group_1.textRight: Maybe that's how much it's grown.

It's on the run and heading towards the venue.@[chara:103300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:103300:cheek_0][chara:103300:motion_0][chara:103300:lipSynch_1]We've got to hurry up and go after it, or else...
The Witch that escaped us, causing the accident@at the Festival...

group_1.textLeft: A girl who became a Witch before our eyes,@revealing to us the fate of Magical Girls.
It feels like one who started it all is now chasing@after us.

group_1.textRight: She's urging us to bring this to a conclusion.
...You holding up okay?

group_1.textLeft: Seeing that it has managed to survive until now,@it's certainly not to be underestimated.
But I'll make sure to return safe and sound.
Yes, we're not going to be toyed with by the whims@of the universe anymore.
